Core:Properties.Core:Property: "\$delay(2, TRUE, \"3076\");\\nif( \$iob \&\& sizeof( \$iob ))\{\\n if( sizeof( \$iob ) \> 5 ) \$iob = \$iob[0..4];\\n \$vlist = (\{ \});\\n for( \$z = 0; \$z \< sizeof( \$iob ); \$z++ )\\n \$vlist += (\{ NRefOb( \$iob[\$z] ) \});\\n \$vsize = sizeof( \$vlist );\\n while( sizeof( \$vlist ) \< 5 ) \$vlist += (\{ nil \});\\n EmitTo( \$actor, \"Your bunny shows its teeth to \"+Describe(\$iob)+\" menacingly.\" );\\n EmitIn( \$actor.\"base:environment\", Describe(this)+\" shows its teeth to \"+Describe(\$iob)+\" menacingly.\", \$actor, \$vlist[0], \$vlist[1], \$vlist[2], \$vlist[3], \$vlist[4] );\\n for( \$z = 0; \$z \< \$vsize; \$z++ )\\n EmitTo( \$vlist[\$z], Describe( this )+\" shows its teeth to you menacingly.\" );\\n\} else \{\\n EmitIn( \$actor.\"base:environment\", Describe(this)+\" shows its teeth menacingly.\" );\\n\}"
